longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid for a minimum of 6 months beyond the period of
  intended stay.
 - Passports issued by Hong Kong (SAR China) or Macao (SAR
   China) must be valid for the period of intended stay. 
Passport Exemptions:
- For additional exemptions and requirements see passport
  exemptions mentioned for the USA. 

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 45 days for those
entitled to travel under the Guam-Northern Mariana Isl. Visa
Waiver program, for holiday or business purposes (SEE NOTE
30572). 
    NOTE 30572: Provided passenger: 
 - applicable to holders of Hong Kong (SAR China) passports
   together with their Hong Kong Identity Card; 
Minors:
- Minors travelling accompanied by one parent or by a person
  other than parent/legal guardian . 
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay and documents required for their next
  destination. (SEE NOTE 46947)
    NOTE 46947: Exempt are holders of a valid US visa
